title: crash and then corruption
body:
Out of nowhere, today when I queued for a game after selecting my champ and then having the game start, the client crashed multiple times.  I sent one bug report then I restarted the client in the hope that this would fix the issue.  The client then told me there was file corruption so I let it fix itself but after that completed I was unable to actually get to the login screen.  After restarting again, the client then told me that it failed to patch and I had to uninstall and reinstall it.  Considering yesterday was perfectly fine and I haven't turned off this computer nor have I changed anything, this is a bit disconcerting.  

Never had anything like this happen to me before the Ivern patch and I've been playing since late beta.

replies.body: It sounds like you are bugsplatting, which is a crash that can happen when a driver or game file issue fails to render the game.  I recommend going over each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which can automatically process some of those steps.  That should get you fixed up, but let me know if you have any questions!
